summary: Trouble strikes when an exhausted pop singer, sent on a vacation to a farm, realizes that the farm's owner grows deadly bees.
cast: Suzanna Leigh|Frank Finlay|Guy Doleman|Catherine Finn|John Harvey|Michael Ripper|Anthony Bailey|Tim Barrett|James Cossins|Frank Forsyth|Katy Wild|Greta Farrer|Gina Gianelli|Michael Gwynn|Maurice Good|Alister Williamson|The Birds|Percy Edwards|Caron Gardner|Kim Gardner|Pete McDaniel|Ali McKenzie|Tony Munroe|Ronnie Wood
title: Picadura mortal
